author: DistroTube
description:
TRMNL is an open source e-ink display that helps you stay focused. It has a variety of plugins to display a variety of information, including: calendar, weather, todo lists, github actions, stock quotes, youtube analytics, motivation quotes, bible verses, and much more.

REFERENCED:
► https://usetrmnl.com/
